author: Natraj Poojary
comment: I make sure to read about the update that an app makes in "whats new" before updating......and in your app i have noticed that it has the same reasons from months. Please can you specify about the update in "whats new".

author: NAMAN Verma
comment: It takes millions of years to install although I m using Samsung galaxy s7 edge

author: Beet Samraj
comment: Nice app
Very good
With new update I lose the weather again in pixel 2 launcher

author: adam steele
comment: Google is google nuff said.
Like this app

You made it extremely difficult to search for images in your not so bright way of appeasing an unknown, irrelevant, and miniscule European image monopoly. Thank you so very much for ruining a great search app for the rest of the world. Maybe next time you people could make a better solution like sending smoke signals or utilizing the telegraph to improve your technology.

Google Assistant will only stay off for a few hours before turning on and interrupting movies, ebooks, music, searches. Yes, the feed setting in my app TURNS ITSELF ON. No representative has given me a helpful answer. And still I buy. Two more overpriced $10 movies that will be interrupted by BLEEEEEP DE BLOOP and sometimes that creepy voice. No one to complain to. My stars shall speak.

author: Parker Landau
comment: Reminders are messed up right now. Keep being reminded to complete a task I already completed. Hitting "Done" in notification doesn't make it disappear forever. It'll pop up again later in the evening. You have to go into the app and swipe the reminder completed, and then you'll still get a reminder for a task you already completed! You need to delete the reminder in order for it to go away.

author: Laszlo Iker
comment: It would be better if I could use my phone on my birth language, and assistant in English. If I set system language to Hungarian then assistant don't talk. Tell me about my day ends in a Google search that way.

author: FickleJupiter68
comment: Awesome app but the widget only shows the weather. It worked a few months ago. I've read through all the formus trying to fix it. They said the bug was logged 6 months ago but it's still not working. I tried 2 different devices also

author: Adeeb Dollie
comment: Awesome app, but the widget only shows the weather. It worked a few months ago. I've read through all the forums trying to fix it. They said the bug was logged 6 months ago but it's still not working. I tried 2 different devices also.

author: Flemming Hansen
comment: Ff's sake make it SIMPLE to turn OFF the goddamn FEED! No matter what settings I turn off, stuff still appears. I'm fed up with your psychometric attention-grabbing timestealing. MY PHONE, not yours.

author: Pratik Dedhia
comment: There is no bookmark or save option for the link which comes under search option. If I have to read that particular article afterwards, I'm unable to do that. There is no full page image view option in image section or when I search for the image in links

author: Mickey McMouse
comment: This stupid google app keeps popping up when going into search. I had to manually disable that. Thats where editing a program comes in handy! Google sucks! Greedy idiots!

author: mike ossesia
comment: Having to go to the 3-dots and find the "hide" item is a real pain. Please bring back swipe-to-hide. And please bring back the search bar, too. You're streamlining the look but making it harder to use.

author: Mr D
comment: Completely useless. Can not figure out how to enable the widget settings, that are not there, to use for my preference. I just need to see the weather. Not to mention the widget doesn't even show time. And yes I disabled all the associated apps and access. I just need the app to work alone.

2018.01.27: If you ask it to call someone on speaker phone, it will call them and highlight the speaker button but for some reason loud speaker doesn't actually enable. You have to manually tap the button off and then on again and then it works. Defeats the object of hands free! 2018.01.27: Now works. 2017.10.13: 'OK Google' doesn't work in landscape view.

author: Lori Cannon
comment: Always a fan of Google, and everything seems to run smoothly.... except for one thing. Everytime I make a reminder using Google (not Google Calendar), the reminder seems to pop up no matter what I do. Whether I swipe the notification reminder, hit "Done" or ignore, the reminder pops up again. It's very frustrating and I do hope it gets fixed soon. I'll give it 5 stars when I noticed it fixed

author: Jay Smith
comment: The only reason I use this app is because without it you use the speech-to-text mic. The mic icon disappears from your keyboard options 😔. HEY GOOGLE!!! Is there any way to disable this app and still keep the mic for speech-to-text???

author: shautysexiey
comment: I used to be able to download Google images right into my phone, since the update, it asks me do I want to download the file and it never truly downloads. It's very frustrating.

author: little_dude
comment: these are just problems i have with images and hopefully are fixed.   1. why can you not put images full screen anymore?  2.why is there no button to take me to a page with only the image so i can download it? downloading from the google app never works and finding it in the website is terrible because sometimes the picture isn't there or the image is much smaller than on the app.

author: Dan Lepinski
comment: Reminders keep coming back despite tapping "done."  The feed has been updating me on random celebrities and athletes I've never heard of it searched before. The 'Upcoming' page doesn't show reminders anymore. The shipping card only shows "shipped" status and never updates. I've marked in my feed that I'm not interested in 'Aviation' but the app continues to show me multiple aviation categorized stories every day.

author: Jacky Tan
comment: Google has become so many things, so much so that as I was looking at this app as it was updating, I thought to myself, "I know the Google Home app, Google Sheet app, Google Doc app… but what is this Google app?" And I actually had to read up the summary to find out. Perhaps it's good to give it a descriptor nowadays, like Google search?

If you enjoy getting your info from one point of view and never exploring a variety of opinions this is the app. I just wanted to search out info to make my own opinions. Not have limited exposure to one side of snow issue.

author: Heather Godlewski
comment: Used to use my feed every day. Since update it does not load fully. No pictures at all just some news titles.

author: Tony Alfonsi
comment: Unreliable, tends to screw up any browser, native or third party with a bogus no network found error in spite of the fact everything else is connecting just found. I installed duck duck go and that is entirely unaffected too so that's now my primary search engine.

author: Paul Hoffman
comment: No longer recognizes that addresses should be opened in Google Maps  Edit 2/27/18: no longer searches. The progress bar loads, but nothing appears on the screen. Come on Google, this is what you're supposed to be good at.

author: Gideon O.A. Wealth
comment: I use this app everyday. Really love it. But one thing, In the new version I can't do away with cards I'm done with.

author: Rob Webb
comment: Removing the ability to swipe away cards that you're either not interested in or finished with is a real step backwards. Whoever decided that was a good idea should be fired immediately!  Update 5/3/18: The news feed just seems to go from bad to worse. It is practically unusable now.

author: Thomas Lee
comment: why I can't go to the see videos I want! Who the hell are you! Why must I keeping update and cannot see the videos I like. Hey I'm 50 SG. No need keepon updating this can't see that can't!!

author: Lucas Kaye
comment: The new Google Feed lags so much I considered getting rid of it... but when I turned it off, it was still there!! The older design looked better and was way smoother.

author: Dan Davis
comment: Used to be great, but it no longer will search my music library in Google play music.  For albums I own it always says, "Sorry, but that is only available for subscribers".  Bad move Google!

author: Ricky Johnson
comment: SUBJECT-HOW ASSISTANT CAN BE IMPROVED I like assistant the most but it can be improved  -When the phone is sleeping and v yell ok Google from another coner of  a room the assistant should be able to respond it shouldn't be like v have 2 go walk to the other coner of room click lock screen button and then say ok Google it seems pointless better is v open with fingerprints it is easier -Assistant should be able 2 scan barcodes it will be awesome -little more improvement it could be one of the best assistants   Overall Google is the best

author: John Tarantino
comment: Past 2 weeks this up has had multiple updates. And now ok google doesn't work it barely hears my voice. My mic has been tested and wirk dc great. Please FIX THIS BUG

author: Thomas Wysocki
comment: The feed use to be great, but unfortunately went backwards and hasn't recovered.  It use to be easy to swipe to dismiss articles and they replaced it with requiring multiple clicks.  The generated options for customizing the feed are generally useless, only good for eliminating the very things I'd be interested in.

author: Patrick Humpal
comment: There's been a lot of great work on this app done over the last few years. The latest updates however are quite confounding. Removing the ability to swipe an item to ignore it without the least bit of iterative retraining is absurd. While I'm not surprised about the heavy handed UI behavioral modification I'm more curious the reasoning and what part of the ad oligarchy decided user opinion was worthless.
